newstudent.heading: New Student Registration
newstudent.description: Join us for a brighter future.

features.heading: Why Choose Us?
features.description: We provide the best to ensure your success.

signin.title: Sign In
signin.instructions: New/active students, use your NIM as the username and your date of birth (yyyymmdd) @ last 4 digits of your phone number in Siakad as the password. Ensure all data in Siakad is complete. Example password format: 19901127@2904.
